trans-unit.source: Provides properties for getting information about the computer's memory, loaded assemblies, name, and operating system.
trans-unit.target: 提供屬性，以取得電腦的記憶體、已載入組件、名稱和作業系統的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The properties exposed by the `My.Computer.Info` object return information about the computer from which the application is deployed, as determined at run time.
trans-unit.target: 所公開的屬性`My.Computer.Info`在執行階段決定物件傳回從中部署應用程式，電腦相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this data differs from what was available on the development computer.
trans-unit.target: 通常，這項資料會在開發電腦上可用的不同。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property to display the amount of available physical memory for the computer on which the code runs.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`屬性來顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的可用實體記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ComputerInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.ComputerInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total amount of free physical memory for the computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦可用實體記憶體的總量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ULong" /> containing the number of bytes of free physical memory for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ULong" />，包含電腦可用實體記憶體的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`屬性需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory` property to display the amount of available physical memory for the computer on which the code runs.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory`屬性來顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的可用實體記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: The application cannot obtain the memory status.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得記憶體狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total amount of the computer's free virtual address space.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦可用虛擬位址空間的總量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ULong" /> containing the number of bytes of the computer's free virtual address space.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ULong" />，包含電腦可用虛擬位址空間的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory`屬性需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory` property to display the amount of available virtual memory for the computer on which the code runs.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.AvailableVirtualMemory`屬性來顯示執行的程式碼之電腦的可用虛擬記憶體數量。

trans-unit.source: The application cannot obtain the memory status.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得記憶體狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current UI culture installed with the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 取得作業系統所安裝的目前 UI 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object represents the UI culture installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件表示電腦上所安裝的 UI 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture` property has the same behavior as the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InstalledUICulture%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture`屬性具有相同的行為<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InstalledUICulture%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In a localized operating system, such as Japanese Windows 2000 Professional, this property returns the culture of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 在當地語系化的作業系統，例如日文 Windows 2000 Professional，這個屬性會傳回作業系統的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture` property to display the name of the operating system's UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.InstalledUICulture`屬性來顯示作業系統的 UI 文化特性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the full operating system name.
trans-unit.target: 取得完整作業系統名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the operating-system name.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含作業系統名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property returns detailed information about the operating system name if Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) is installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果在電腦上安裝 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI)，這個屬性會傳回作業系統名稱的詳細的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property returns the same string as the `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property, which provides less detailed information than WMI can provide.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個屬性會傳回相同的字串`My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`屬性，提供小於在可以提供 WMI 的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSFullName` property to display the name of the computer's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.OSFullName`作業系統屬性，顯示電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The calling code does not have full trust.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫程式碼沒有完全信任。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the platform identifier for the operating system of the computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦作業系統的平台識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the platform identifier for the operating system of the computer, chosen from the member names of the <see cref="T:System.PlatformID" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含電腦作業系統的平台識別項，從 <see cref="T:System.PlatformID" /> 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的成員名稱中選擇。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property provides functionality similar to the <xref:System.OperatingSystem.Platform%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Environment.OSVersion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`屬性會提供類似的功能<xref:System.OperatingSystem.Platform%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Environment.OSVersion%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform` property to display the platform of the computer's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.OSPlatform`屬性顯示的平台電腦的作業系統。

trans-unit.source: The application cannot obtain the operating-system platform information.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得作業系統的平台資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the computer's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦作業系統的版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="String" /> containing the current version number of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="String" />，包含目前作業系統的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property formats the version as "major.minor.build.revision".
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`屬性格式化為 「 major.minor.build.revision 」 版本。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property provides functionality similar to the <xref:System.OperatingSystem.Version%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Environment.OSVersion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`屬性會提供類似的功能<xref:System.OperatingSystem.Version%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Environment.OSVersion%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.OSVersion` property to display the version of the computer's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.OSVersion`屬性來顯示電腦版本的作業系統。

trans-unit.source: The application cannot obtain the operating-system version information.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得作業系統版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total amount of physical memory for the computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦實體記憶體的總量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ULong" /> containing the number of bytes of physical memory for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ULong" />，包含電腦實體記憶體的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista..
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory`屬性需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista...

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory` property to display the total amount of physical memory for the computer on which the code runs.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory`屬性來顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的實體記憶體總數。

trans-unit.source: The application cannot obtain the memory status.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得記憶體狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total amount of virtual address space available for the computer.
trans-unit.target: 取得電腦可用虛擬位址空間的總量。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="ULong" /> containing the number of bytes of virtual address space available for the computer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="ULong" />，包含電腦可用虛擬位址空間的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The `My.Computer.Info.TotalVirtualMemory` property requires Windows XP, Windows 2000 Professional, Windows Server 2003, Windows 2000 Server, or Windows Vista..
trans-unit.target: `My.Computer.Info.TotalVirtualMemory`屬性需要 Windows XP、 Windows 2000 Professional、 Windows Server 2003、 Windows 2000 Server 或 Windows Vista...

trans-unit.source: This example uses the `My.Computer.Info.TotalVirtualMemory` property to display the total amount of virtual memory for the computer on which the code runs.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Info.TotalVirtualMemory`屬性來顯示程式碼執行所在之電腦的虛擬記憶體總數。

trans-unit.source: The application cannot obtain the memory status.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式無法取得記憶體狀態。
